item.title: Bishop Museum joins Suncoast View and speaks on new Rare Giant Ground Sloth Fossil found in Manatee County
item.description: The Bishop Museum of Science and Nature joined us in the studio to talk about the discovery of a Jefferson Ground Sloth claw unearthed by Manatee County Utilities.

item.description: Interview with Giovanni Pelletier's Mother and Stepfather

item.title: Woman gets 25 years for murder of roommate in Sarasota
item.description: Courtney Leigh Wadeck entered a plea of no contest to second-degree murder Aug. 7.

item.title: Erin to become major hurricane. Will Florida feel it?
item.description: Sea breeze thunderstorms to increase this weekend.

item.title: Special Olympics paddlers take to the water at Nathan Benderson Park Aug. 16
item.description: The event will feature 155 athletes competing in various Stand-Up paddle races.

item.title: Positive ID made of Giovanni Pelletier’s body, cause of death still unknown
item.description: Pelletier was last seen exiting the vehicle he was traveling in to visit family on August 1.

item.title: Endangered Sawfish safely rescued and relocated from Bishop Harbor
item.description: Researchers said the fish may have been trapped by flooding during Hurricane Helene.

item.title: Sarasota woman convicted of manslaughter in infant’s death
item.description: Investigators noted that the child endured a series of injuries before he died.

item.title: Erin about to become a hurricane. Will Florida feel anything?
item.description: NHC's latest forecast has the hurricane becoming a category 4.

item.title: Family of Giovanni Pelletier slams investigators, will pay for second autopsy
item.description: Pelletier also said the cousins who last saw her son know more than they are telling police.

item.title: Limited Showers Today, Wetter Weekend Ahead
8 A.M update: Erin better organized, but still a tropical storm
